title: Cassiopeas Ultimate Bug on Fakers play

embed.description: ► SKT FAKER LCK highlights and Best PLAYS 2017 | LCK Spring 2017 ➥ WATCH MORE LCS/LCK MONTAGES !

body: I think there is a huge bug on the way faker use his ultimate in this play, if you watch carefuly he throw it in the opposite direction but hit corcky anyway.-

replies.body: I believe this was fixed a while ago...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=q9ift0Zi,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-09-08T22:12:04.614+0000)
>
> I believe this was fixed a while ago...

the clip is labeled 2017 SPRING so.....
If you watch King Cobra vids, He does it for fun.

2:06, this is a known bug with casseopea.  If you start her ult and flash right at that moment it will show firing backwards but actually will fire forward.  they have made a number of attempts to fix this but there are still cases where it shows up. or atleast it did until recently.
Certain abilities can change direction like that when you flash during the cast time. It's not a bug
